00013 #ifndef _SIMPLE_FS_H_
00014 #define _SIMPLE_FS_H_
00015 
00016 /* The following file names are already in use:
00017  * 
00018  * prg - program image propagated by Aqueduct or Deluge
00019  * aqX - cache file used by Aqueduct or Deluge, X is a letter starting from '1'
00020  * rrp - temporary program image stored by repro_reprogram function before it
00021  *       gets renamed to 'prg' or 'bkX'
00022  * bkX - backup image, X is a letter starting from '1'
00023  */
00024  
00025 #include "mos.h"
00026 
00027 typedef struct {
00028         // This field was originally supposed to mean something more,
00029         // but now is just being used as a flag that the file is allocated. 
00030         int8_t index;
00031         uint8_t name[3];
00032         uint32_t start;
00033         uint32_t length;
00034 } mos_file;
00035 
00036 void simple_fs_init();
00037 void simple_fs_format();
00038 mos_file* mos_file_create(const char* name, uint32_t length);
00039 mos_file* mos_file_open(const char* name);
00040 void mos_file_rename(const char* src, const char* dst);
00041 uint16_t mos_file_read(uint8_t* buf, mos_file* file, uint32_t offset, uint16_t length);
00042 uint16_t mos_file_write(uint8_t* buf, mos_file* file, uint32_t offset, uint16_t length);
00043 uint16_t mos_file_crc(mos_file* file, uint32_t offset, uint32_t length);
00044 void mos_file_flush(mos_file* file);
00045 int8_t mos_file_close(mos_file* file);
00046 void simple_fs_ls();
00047 
00048 #endif /* _SIMPLE_FS_H_ */
